title: PlaceList: Your Personal AI Map
subtitle: Personalized Place Recommendations, LLM-powered Map Service
description: PlaceList is the map version of ChatGPT, recommending places tailored to your context.
hero_subtitle: The map version of ChatGPT, personalized place recommendations just for you
hero_description: Unlike existing map apps, PlaceList understands your preferences, situation, and context to recommend only the places you really need.
features_subtitle: A new experience different from existing map apps
feature_ai_desc: Learns your preferences and situation to provide accurate recommendations
feature_context_desc: Considers various factors like time, weather, mood, and more
use_case_1_desc: Discover restaurants and attractions like a local in your travel destination
use_case_2_desc: Get recommendations for perfect date locations considering your partner's preferences
use_case_3_desc: Find places that match your counterpart's personality and meeting purpose
video_subtitle: Create special moments with AI-recommended optimal spaces
gallery_subtitle: Check out the various places recommended by PlaceList
team_subtitle: A team building the future of spatial exploration
team_desc: We are revolutionizing people's spatial exploration experience by combining AI and spatial data.
contact_desc: Feel free to contact us for user interviews, partnerships, investment inquiries, and more.
form_message_placeholder: Please write freely about what you'd like to discuss or any questions you have...
form_success_desc: We'll contact you via email within 24 hours.
meeting_title: Placelist recommends these kinds of spaces
meeting_description:
When users have appointments, AI recommends the best spaces based on location, atmosphere, and purpose.
For important meetings and days when you want to lift your mood, PlaceList makes appointments special.
innovation_title: PlaceList revolutionizes existing place discovery methods
gallery_recommend_title: We recommend these kinds of spaces
creator_section_subheading: Sensational spaces, recommended directly by creator AI
creator_section_paragraph1: PlaceList collaborates with space creators to carefully select and recommend only spaces that are sensitive and trend-aware.
creator_section_paragraph2: Each creator's AI agent finds the optimal place for you based on their unique perspective and experience.
innovation_desc_1: AI that understands context for recommendations
innovation_desc_1_detail: Place recommendations aren't enough with just 'keywords'. PlaceList understands the purpose of appointments, time slots, location, and atmosphere to find the space you'll like most.
innovation_desc_2: Recommendations that know you better the more you use them
innovation_desc_2_detail: Starting with one conversation, it becomes more personalized. It learns saved places, conversation history, and preferred styles to become your personal taste curator.
innovation_desc_3_detail: We don't recommend places that are just pretty. Based on space creator curation and user review data, we only select spaces that provide truly 'good experiences'.
gallery_cafe_modern_desc: A cafe with warm atmosphere and sophisticated interior
gallery_cafe_modern_detail: A space for quiet conversations and alone time
gallery_cafe_dessert_desc: Aesthetic dessert space that captures both visual appeal and taste
gallery_cafe_dessert_detail: A place to make special days even sweeter
gallery_bar_desc: Perfect evening space with lighting, music, and conversation
gallery_bar_detail: For dates or days when you want deep conversations
gallery_food_desc: Real hidden gems that only locals know best
gallery_food_detail: For moments when you want to enjoy comfortably without pressure
gallery_architecture_desc: A place where the space itself becomes inspiration with architectural charm
gallery_architecture_detail: Urban walking course that becomes special just by sightseeing
gallery_travel_desc: That alley you found without a map, unexpectedly memorable
gallery_travel_detail: A space filled with unexpected emotions encountered in unfamiliar places
vacatio_desc_1: We innovate the way people consume spaces,
vacatio_desc_2: creating a world where every life becomes a journey.
